blockquote.p: This profile is slated for deprecation. It is included in this ballot for comparison purposes but is not expected to be included in the FHIR R4 published specification. This material is being refactored into an Implementation Guide (IG) for clinical genomics reporting, which can be found here.

div.p: Another profile is created for variants and consensus sequence in HLA typing report on top of the Observation resource. The variant extension referring to the Sequence resource has multiple values so this profile can support multi-variant.
